mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_tb(second_category_id , product_name, price, product_feature, quantity, created_at) values(#{secondCategoryId},#{productName},#{price},#{productFeature},#{quantity},now());
mapper.update: UPDATE product_tb SET second_category_id = #{secondCategoryId}, product_name = #{productName}, price = #{price}, product_feature = #{productFeature}, quantity = #{quantity}, created_at = now() WHERE id = #{id};
mapper.select: select pt.* , pit.image , sct.second_category_name from product_tb pt join product_image_tb pit on pt.id = pit.product_id join second_category_tb sct on pt.second_category_id = sct.id where pt.id = #{productId} and pit.is_thumbnail = 0 order by (pit.id) ASC;

SELECT * FROM product_tb pt JOIN product_image_tb pit ON pt.id = pit.product_id WHERE pit.is_thumbnail = 1 AND pt.second_category_id IN ( SELECT sct.id FROM second_category_tb sct WHERE sct.category_id = #{firstCategoryId});

SELECT pt.*, pit.id imgId, pit.image , pit.is_thumbnail , sct.id scId, sct.second_category_name , fct.id fcId, fct.first_category_name FROM product_tb pt JOIN product_image_tb pit ON pt.id = pit.product_id JOIN second_category_tb sct ON pt.second_category_id = sct.id JOIN first_category_tb fct ON fct.id = sct.first_category_id WHERE pt.id = #{productId};

select pt.second_category_id,pit.product_id, pt.product_name, pit.image from product_image_tb pit left join product_tb pt on pt.id = pit.product_id where pt.product_name like CONCAT('%',#{searchData},'%') and pit.is_thumbnail=1 group by pit.product_id limit 9
